basics.name: Ramit Islam
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a student in the B.S. program in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021.

work.summary: Manage social media, website, collateral design and fund development for the agency.
highlights: Oversaw rebranding for agency which included new logo design, agency collateral redesign, and fresh website overhaul.
Managed 20th and 25th Anniversary year-long events, as well as all major fundraising events for agency.

work.summary: Manage promotions, marketing and project organization for clubs and specialized music/dance events.
Developing, maintaining and coordinating public relations with clientele, media and a variety of sponsors.
highlights: Developing relationships with key international booking agents, celebrated performing artists and renowned clubs,

Produced & performed at events for high end establishments such as Morimoto Waikiki, St. Regis Princeville, Nobu Waikiki, The Edition Hotel, The Modern Honolulu, Modern Luxury Magazine, Luxury Row, Salvatore Ferragamo, and Emporio Armani.

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
